src:
Menanti Tabebuya di Cikini, Yuk Main ke Tamannya di Jagakarsa
05 Nov 2019, 13:10 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Taman Tabebuya di Jagakarsa, Jakarta Selatan (Fitraya/detikcom)

Jakarta - Salah satu perubahan wajah kawasan di Cikini, Jakarta Pusat adalah pohon-pohon Angsana di Cikini yang ditebang dan wacananya akan diganti pohon Tabebuya. Sudah tahu kalau di Jakarta Selatan malah ada tamannya?Bagi traveler yang sering lewat daerah Cikini, bisa memperhatikan kalau pohon-pohon angsana yang rindang kini sudah tidak terlihat lagi di trotoar Jalan Cikini Raya, Jakarta Pusat. Pohon-pohon yang ditebang itu ada di tengah-tengah trotoar yang sebelumnya diperlebar.Pemkot Jakarta Pusat beralasan pohon-pohon itu ditebang demi keamanan saat masuk musim hujan. Pohon besar dikhawatirkan bisa roboh. Di tengah ramainya pembahasan seputar hal tersebut, Wakil Wali Kota Jakarta Pusat Irwandi turut memastikan pohon-pohon yang ditebang di Cikini akan diganti. Penggantinya bukan lagi angsana melainkan Tabebuya."Iya, diganti. Kan pohon tua kan rapuh,(seperti) Angsana. Itu kan rapuh, ganti pohon kuat tabebuya," ucap Irwandi. Sambil menanti Pohon Tabebuya di Cikini, mungkin ada traveler yang belum tahu seperti apa pohon yang nantinya akan menghiasi salah satu jalan utama Jakarta itu. Apabila penasaran, tak ada salahnya main ke Taman Taebebuya di Jakarta Selatan.


Berlokasi di Jakagarsa (Fitraya/detikcom)

Taman Tabebuya berada di Jl Moh Kahfi I, Ciganjur, Jagakarsa, Jakarta Selatan. Letaknya dekat dengan pertigaan Jagakarsa, di turunan yang merupakan lembah. Traveler yang berangkat kerja dari arah Depok ke Cilandak via Jl Moh Kahfi I, pasti melewati taman ini.detikcom pun pernah berkunjung ke Taman Tabebuya beberapa waktu lalu. Taman Tabebuya dinaungi Dinas Pertamanan Jakarta Selatan. Untuk ketertiban taman ada 8 satpam dan 11 petugas kebersihan di sini. Ada pula ruang parkir terbatas untuk belasan motor dan sejumlah mobil.Berkunjung ke taman ini, traveler bisa melihat Pohon Tabebuya yang sekilas mirip Pohon Sakura di Jepang. Hanya saja warna bunganya bukan pink, walau jenisnya disebut sebagai pohon peneduh. Kehebatan lainnya dari pohon ini adalah karena disebut mampu menyerap karbon di udara.


Ada wahana permainan anak juga (Fitraya/detikcom)

Traveler yang membawa si buah hati pun akan dimanjakan oleh sejumlah wahana permainan anak seperti ayunan dan lainnya di taman ini. Tak sedikit juga traveler yang gemar beraktivitas di sini, layaknya Taman Suropati di Jakarta Pusat.Bagi traveler yang ingin datang berkunjung, Taman Tabebuya buka setiap hari dari pukul 07.00-17.30 WIB. Tidak dikenakan biaya berkunjung alias gratis. Minat berkunjung ke taman ini sambil menanti yang di Cikini rampung?Simak Video "Cikini Dulu dan Kini, Jakarta"[Gambas:Video 20detik](rdy/krs)
text:
Waiting for Tabebuya in Cikini, let's play to the park in Jagakarsa
05 Nov 2019, 13:10 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Taman Tabebuya in Jagakarsa, South Jakarta (Fitraya / detikcom)

Jakarta - One of the changes in the face of the area in Cikini, Central Jakarta is the Angsana trees in Cikini that are cut down and the discourse will be replaced by the Tabebuya tree. Already know that in South Jakarta there is even a park? For travelers who often pass through the Cikini area, can pay attention that the shady angsana trees are now no longer visible on the sidewalk of Jalan Cikini Raya, Central Jakarta. The felled trees are in the middle of the sidewalk that was previously widened. Central Jakarta City Government said the trees were cut down for safety during the rainy season. It is feared that a large tree could collapse. In the midst of intense discussion about this, the Deputy Mayor of Central Jakarta Irwandi helped ensure that the trees cut down in Cikini would be replaced. "The replacement is no longer the angsana but the Tabebuya." Yes, it is replaced. The old tree is fragile, (like) Angsana. It is fragile, replace the strong tree of Tabebuya, "said Irwandi. While waiting for the Tabebuya Tree in Cikini, there may be a traveler who does not yet know what kind of tree will later adorn one of Jakarta's main streets. If you are curious, there is no harm in playing to Taebebuya Park in South Jakarta.


Located in Jakagarsa (Fitraya / detikcom)

Tabebuya Park is located at Jl Moh Kahfi I, Ciganjur, Jagakarsa, South Jakarta. It is located close to the Jagakarsa T-junction, in a derivative which is a valley. A traveler who goes to work from the direction of Depok to Cilandak via Jl Moh Kahfi I, must have passed this park. Detikcom also visited Tabebuya Park some time ago. Tabebuya Park is shaded by South Jakarta Park Department. To order the park there are 8 security guards and 11 janitors here. There is also a limited parking space for dozens of motorbikes and a number of cars. Visiting this park, a traveler can see the Tabebuya Tree at a glance like the Sakura Tree in Japan. It's just that the color of the flowers is not pink, although the type is called a shade tree. Another great thing about this tree is that it is said to be able to absorb carbon in the air.


There are rides for children's games too (Fitraya / detikcom)

A traveler who brings the baby will also be spoiled by a number of children's rides such as swings and more in this park. Not a few are also travelers who like to do activities here, like Taman Suropati in Central Jakarta. For travelers who want to come visit, Taman Tabebuya is open every day from 07.00-17.30 WIB. No charge, aka free visit. Interest in visiting this park while waiting for the one in Cikini to be completed? Check out the video "Cikini Back then and Now, Jakarta" [Gambas: Video 20second] (rdy / krs)
